text.section: In St. Mary's County a person 18 years of age or older may serve alcoholic beverages in restaurants in connection with serving of a meal. Persons under 21 years of age may not act as bartender or barmaid or in any solely bar-related capacity in St. Mary's County.

The Alcohol Beverage Board of St. Mary's County may regulate the playing time and noise level of a mechanical music box, live music, or a sound making device on licensed premises if the sound disturbs the peace, tranquility, safety, and health of the surrounding neighborhood.
